verses.verse: כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When תֵ֭שֵׁב <WH3427> When thou sittest לִלְח֣וֹם <WH3898> to eat אֶת־ <WH854> with מוֹשֵׁ֑ל <WH4910> with a ruler בִּ֥ין <WH995> consider תָּ֝בִ֗ין <WH995> diligently אֶת־ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what לְפָנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> what [is] before
וְשַׂמְתָּ֣ <WH7760> And put שַׂכִּ֣ין <WH7915> a knife בְּלֹעֶ֑ךָ <WH3930> to thy throat אִם־ <WH518> If בַּ֖עַל <WH1167> if thou [be] a man given נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> to appetite אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> you
אַל־ <WH408> not תִּ֭תְאָו <WH183> Be not desirous לְמַטְעַמּוֹתָ֑יו <WH4303> of his dainties וְ֝ה֗וּא <WH1931> he לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> meat כְּזָבִֽים׃ <WH3577> for they [are] deceitful
אַל־ <WH408> not תִּיגַ֥ע <WH3021> Labour לְֽהַעֲשִׁ֑יר <WH6238> not to be rich מִֽבִּינָתְךָ֥ <WH998> from thine own wisdom חֲדָֽל׃ <WH2308> cease

[הֲתָעוּף כ] (הֲתָ֤עִיף <WH5774> brandish ק) עֵינֶ֥יךָ <WH5869> thine eyes בּ֗וֹ וְֽאֵ֫ינֶ֥נּוּ <WH369> is gone כִּ֤י <WH3588> for עָשֹׂ֣ה <WH6213> upon that which is not? for [riches] certainly יַעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> make לּ֣וֹ כְנָפַ֑יִם <WH3671> themselves wings כְּ֝נֶ֗שֶׁר <WH5404> as an eagle [וְעָיֵף כ] (יָע֥וּף <WH5774> brandish ק) הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> toward heaven פ

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּלְחַ֗ם <WH3898> Eat אֶת־ <WH853> לֶ֭חֶם <WH3899> thou not the bread רַ֣ע <WH7451> of [him that hath] an evil עָ֑יִן <WH5869> eye וְאַל־ <WH408> nay [תִּתְאָו כ] (תִּ֝תְאָ֗יו <WH183> desire ק) לְמַטְעַמֹּתָֽיו׃ <WH4303> thou his dainty meats

כִּ֤י ׀ <WH3588> for כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> he שָׁעַ֥ר <WH8176> For as he thinketh בְּנַפְשׁ֗וֹ <WH5315> in his heart כֶּ֫ן־ <WH3651> so ה֥וּא <WH1931> to you אֱכֹ֣ל <WH398> so [is] he Eat וּ֭שְׁתֵה <WH8354> and drink יֹ֣אמַר <WH559> saith לָ֑ךְ וְ֝לִבּ֗וֹ <WH3820> he to thee but his heart בַּל־ <WH1077> lest עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> up

פִּֽתְּךָ־ <WH6595> The morsel אָכַ֥לְתָּ <WH398> [which] thou hast eaten תְקִיאֶ֑נָּה <WH6958> shalt thou vomit up וְ֝שִׁחַ֗תָּ <WH7843> and lose דְּבָרֶ֥יךָ <WH1697> words הַנְּעִימִֽים׃ <WH5273> thy sweet

בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <WH241> not in the ears כְ֭סִיל <WH3684> of a fool אַל־ <WH408> not תְּדַבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> Speak כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָ֝ב֗וּז <WH936> for he will despise לְשֵׂ֣כֶל <WH7922> the wisdom מִלֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH4405> of thy words

אַל־ <WH408> nay תַּ֭סֵּג <WH5253> Remove גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> landmark עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> not the old וּבִשְׂדֵ֥י <WH7704> not into the fields יְ֝תוֹמִ֗ים <WH3490> of the fatherless אַל־ <WH408> not תָּבֹֽא׃ <WH935> and enter

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For גֹאֲלָ֥ם <WH1350> For their redeemer חָזָ֑ק <WH2389> [is] mighty הֽוּא־ <WH1931> He יָרִ֖יב <WH7378> he shall plead אֶת־ <WH853> רִיבָ֣ם <WH7379> their cause אִתָּֽךְ׃ <WH854> against
הָבִ֣יאָה <WH935> Apply לַמּוּסָ֣ר <WH4148> unto instruction לִבֶּ֑ךָ <WH3820> thine heart וְ֝אָזְנֶ֗ךָ <WH241> and thine ears לְאִמְרֵי־ <WH561> to the words דָֽעַת׃ <WH1847> of knowledge

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּמְנַ֣ע <WH4513> Withhold מִנַּ֣עַר <WH5288> from the child מוּסָ֑ר <WH4148> not correction כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Although תַכֶּ֥נּוּ <WH5221> for [if] thou beatest בַ֝שֵּׁ֗בֶט <WH7626> him with the rod לֹ֣א <WH3808> he will not יָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> he shall not die
אַ֭תָּה <WH859> you בַּשֵּׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> him with the rod תַּכֶּ֑נּוּ <WH5221> Thou shalt beat וְ֝נַפְשׁ֗וֹ <WH5315> his soul מִשְּׁא֥וֹל <WH7585> from hell תַּצִּֽיל׃ <WH5337> and shalt deliver

בְּ֭נִי <WH1121> My son אִם־ <WH518> if חָכַ֣ם <WH2449> be wise לִבֶּ֑ךָ <WH3820> if thine heart יִשְׂמַ֖ח <WH8055> shall rejoice לִבִּ֣י <WH3820> my heart גַם־ <WH1571> also אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> even mine
וְתַעְלֹ֥זְנָה <WH5937> shall rejoice כִלְיוֹתָ֑י <WH3629> Yea my reins בְּדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> speak שְׂ֝פָתֶ֗יךָ <WH8193> when thy lips מֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <WH4339> right things

אַל־ <WH408> nay יְקַנֵּ֣א <WH7065> envy לִ֭בְּךָ <WH3820> Let not thine heart בַּֽחַטָּאִ֑ים <WH2400> sinners כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but בְּיִרְאַת־ <WH3374> but [be thou] in the fear יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> all the day
כִּ֭י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> For surely there is אַחֲרִ֑ית <WH319> an end וְ֝תִקְוָתְךָ֗ <WH8615> and thine expectation לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִכָּרֵֽת׃ <WH3772> shall not be cut off
שְׁמַע־ <WH8085> Hear אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you בְנִ֣י <WH1121> thou my son וַחֲכָ֑ם <WH2449> and be wise וְאַשֵּׁ֖ר <WH833> and guide בַּדֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way לִבֶּֽךָ׃ <WH3820> thine heart
אַל־ <WH408> nay תְּהִ֥י <WH1961> not be with בְסֹֽבְאֵי־ <WH5433> heavy יָ֑יִן <WH3196> of wine בְּזֹלֲלֵ֖י <WH2151> among riotous eaters בָשָׂ֣ר <WH1320> of flesh לָֽמוֹ׃

כִּי־ <WH3588> For סֹבֵ֣א <WH5433> For the drunkard וְ֭זוֹלֵל <WH2151> and the glutton יִוָּרֵ֑שׁ <WH3423> shall come to poverty וּ֝קְרָעִ֗ים <WH7168> [a man] with rags תַּלְבִּ֥ישׁ <WH3847> shall clothe נוּמָֽה׃ <WH5124> and drowsiness

שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> Hearken לְ֭אָבִיךָ <WH1> unto thy father זֶ֣ה <WH2088> who יְלָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3205> that begat וְאַל־ <WH408> not תָּ֝ב֗וּז <WH936> thee and despise כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when זָקְנָ֥ה <WH2204> when she is old אִמֶּֽךָ׃ <WH517> not thy mother

אֱמֶ֣ת <WH571> the truth קְ֭נֵה <WH7069> Buy וְאַל־ <WH408> not תִּמְכֹּ֑ר <WH4376> and sell חָכְמָ֖ה <WH2451> [it] not [also] wisdom וּמוּסָ֣ר <WH4148> and instruction וּבִינָֽה׃ <WH998> and understanding

[גֹּול כ] (גִּ֣יל <WH1523> be glad ק) [יָגֹול כ] (יָ֭גִיל <WH1523> be glad ק) אֲבִ֣י <WH1> The father צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> of the righteous [יֹולֵד כ] (וְיֹולֵ֥ד <WH3205> bear ק) חָ֝כָ֗ם <WH2450> a wise [וְיִשְׂמַח־ כ] (יִשְׂמַח־ <WH8055> will be glad בּֽוֹ׃ <WH8055> [child] shall have joy ק)
יִֽשְׂמַח־ <WH8055> shall be glad אָבִ֥יךָ <WH1> Thy father וְאִמֶּ֑ךָ <WH517> and thy mother וְ֝תָגֵ֗ל <WH1523> thee shall rejoice יֽוֹלַדְתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH3205> and she that bare
תְּנָֽה־ <WH5414> give בְנִ֣י <WH1121> My son לִבְּךָ֣ <WH3820> me thine heart לִ֑י וְ֝עֵינֶ֗יךָ <WH5869> and let thine eyes דְּרָכַ֥י <WH1870> my ways [תִּרְצֶנָה כ] (תִּצֹּֽרְנָה <WH7521> accept ק)
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שׁוּחָ֣ה <WH7745> ditch עֲמֻקָּ֣ה <WH6013> [is] a deep זוֹנָ֑ה <WH2181> For a whore וּבְאֵ֥ר <WH875> pit צָ֝רָ֗ה <WH6862> [is] a narrow נָכְרִיָּֽה׃ <WH5237> and a strange woman

אַף־ <WH637> Surely הִ֭יא <WH1931> as כְּחֶ֣תֶף <WH2863> as [for] a prey תֶּֽאֱרֹ֑ב <WH693> She also lieth in wait וּ֝בוֹגְדִ֗ים <WH898> the transgressors בְּאָדָ֥ם <WH120> among men תּוֹסִֽף׃ <WH3254> and increaseth

לְמִ֨י <WH4310> Who א֥וֹי <WH188> Woe לְמִ֪י <WH4310> Who אֲב֡וֹי <WH17> sorrow לְמִ֤י <WH4310> Who [מִדֹונִים כ] (מִדְיָנִ֨ים <WH4066> brawling ק) לְמִ֥י <WH4310> Who שִׂ֗יחַ <WH7879> babbling לְ֭מִי <WH4310> Who פְּצָעִ֣ים <WH6482> has wounds חִנָּ֑ם <WH2600> without לְ֝מִ֗י <WH4310> Who חַכְלִל֥וּת <WH2448> has redness עֵינָֽיִם׃ <WH5869> affliction
לַֽמְאַחֲרִ֥ים <WH309> They that tarry long עַל־ <WH5921> over הַיָּ֑יִן <WH3196> at the wine לַ֝בָּאִ֗ים <WH935> they that go לַחְקֹ֥ר <WH2713> to seek מִמְסָֽךְ׃ <WH4469> mixed wine

אַל־ <WH408> not תֵּ֥רֶא <WH7200> Look יַיִן֮ <WH3196> not thou upon the wine כִּ֪י <WH3588> when יִתְאַ֫דָּ֥ם <WH119> when it is red כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> when it giveth [בַּכִּיס כ] (בַּכֹּ֣וס <WH3599> bag ק) עֵינ֑וֹ <WH5869> his colour יִ֝תְהַלֵּ֗ךְ <WH1980> [when] it moveth בְּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <WH4339> itself aright
אַ֭חֲרִיתוֹ <WH319> At the last כְּנָחָ֣שׁ <WH5175> like a serpent יִשָּׁ֑ךְ <WH5391> it biteth וּֽכְצִפְעֹנִ֥י <WH6848> like an adder יַפְרִֽשׁ׃ <WH6567> and stingeth
עֵ֭ינֶיךָ <WH5869> Thine eyes יִרְא֣וּ <WH7200> shall behold זָר֑וֹת <WH2114> strange women וְ֝לִבְּךָ֗ <WH3820> and thine heart יְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> shall utter תַּהְפֻּכֽוֹת׃ <WH8419> perverse things

וְ֭הָיִיתָ <WH1961> become כְּשֹׁכֵ֣ב <WH7901> Yea thou shalt be as he that lieth down בְּלֶב־ <WH3820> in the midst יָ֑ם <WH3220> of the sea וּ֝כְשֹׁכֵ֗ב <WH7901> or as he that lieth בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> upon the top חִבֵּֽל׃ <WH2260> of a mast

הִכּ֥וּנִי <WH5221> They have stricken בַל־ <WH1077> did not חָלִיתִי֮ <WH2470> me [shalt thou say and] I was not sick הֲלָמ֗וּנִי <WH1986> they have beaten בַּל־ <WH1077> did not יָ֫דָ֥עְתִּי <WH3045> me [and] I felt מָתַ֥י <WH4970> When אָקִ֑יץ <WH6974> [it] not when shall I awake א֝וֹסִ֗יף <WH3254> it yet אֲבַקְשֶׁ֥נּוּ <WH1245> ? I will seek עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> again
